alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with torrentiaL will impact portions of southern Marinette and central Oconto Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Menominee to 8 miles northwest of Oconto. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, torrential rainfall and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief torrential downpours could cause localized urban flooding. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Pound, Peshtigo, Porterfield, Beaver, Spruce, Coleman, Lena, Harmony and Hickory Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
